entry.data:
CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS AROUND 20
NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
